title: Social Distance Monitoring
description: Developed a system to monitor and ensure social distancing between individuals using a centroid tracking algorithm

title: Personalized Image Annotation Using Facebook (Research Project)
description: Enhanced a personalized image annotation tool using advanced deep learning techniques for similar image retrieval.

title: Issue resolution with ChatGPT Using ML Models
description: Developed and tested models to predict whether a developer's issue would be resolved based on initial prompts.
